description: table with curved front and sides; straight legs; top unfolds on hinges; decorated on front apron with inlaid medallion on each corner and inlaid border at large central rectangle; carved molding below apron and 4 openwork insets at corners of front legs
markings: \'MAHOGANY SIDE TABLE/Made by Walter C. Briggs, 4540 Fremont/ Av. South, Minneapolis, Minn. Started/July 19, \'56, finished Nov. 22, \'56./Copied from a table in the \'Charleston\'/Dining Room in the Minneapolis/Art/Institute. Cost of all materials-$41.35.\', on typewritten label, on bottom
title: Sheraton Table
